original_text: And he changed his behaviour before them, and feigned himself mad in their hands, and scrabbled on the doors of the gate, and let his spittle fall down upon his beard.
korean_text: 그들 앞에서 그의 행동을 변하여 미친 체하고 대문짝에 그적거리며 침을 수염에 흘리매

sentences.original_text: And he changed his behaviour before them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들 앞에서 그의 행동을 바꾸었고

sentences.original_text: and feigned himself mad in their hands
and scrabbled on the doors of the gate
and let his spittle fall down upon his beard
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 침이 그의 수염 위로 떨어지게 했습니다
